citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_6f6560e7-7497-4685-9df2-51c66080b7c9\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Brett\", \"family\": \"Johnson\"}, {\"given\": \"Tim\", \"family\": \"van der Stap\"}, {\"given\": \"Krystal\", \"family\": \"Bachen\"}, {\"given\": \"Eric\", \"family\": \"Rondeau\"}, {\"given\": \"Terry\", \"family\": \"Beacham\"}, {\"given\": \"Steve\", \"family\": \"Latham\"}, {\"given\": \"Brian\", \"family\": \"Hunt\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2023\", \"01\", \"18\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ces ensembles de donn\u00e9es contiennent des identifications g\u00e9n\u00e9tiques de stocks de saumons rouges juv\u00e9niles collect\u00e9es par le Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program entre 2015 et 2021. Ces informations nous indiquent la probabilit\u00e9 que chaque poisson soit originaire d'un bassin versant sp\u00e9cifique. L'identification du stock a \u00e9t\u00e9 effectu\u00e9e \u00e0 la station biologique du Pacifique du minist\u00e8re des P\u00eaches et des Oc\u00e9ans \u00e0 Nanaimo, en Colombie-Britannique, en utilisant la base de r\u00e9f\u00e9rence coastwide040118.bse, qui comprend 214 populations distinctes.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"Hakai Institute\", \"title\": \"Identification g\u00e9n\u00e9tique des stocks de saumons rouges juv\u00e9niles captur\u00e9s dans les \u00eeles Discovery et le d\u00e9troit de Johnstone, en Colombie-Britannique, au Canada, de 2015 \u00e0 2021\", \"version\": \"2.0\", \"DOI\": \"10.21966/9ktc-qm09\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_6f6560e7-7497-4685-9df2-51c66080b7c9?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_6f6560e7-7497-4685-9df2-51c66080b7c9\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Brett\", \"family\": \"Johnson\"}, {\"given\": \"Tim\", \"family\": \"van der Stap\"}, {\"given\": \"Krystal\", \"family\": \"Bachen\"}, {\"given\": \"Eric\", \"family\": \"Rondeau\"}, {\"given\": \"Terry\", \"family\": \"Beacham\"}, {\"given\": \"Steve\", \"family\": \"Latham\"}, {\"given\": \"Brian\", \"family\": \"Hunt\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2023\", \"01\", \"18\"]}], \"abstract\": \"This datasets contains genetic stock identifications for juvenile sockeye salmon collected by the Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program between 2015 and 2021. This information tells us the probability that each specific fish originates from a specific watershed. The stock ID was done at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Pacific Biological Station in Nanaimo BC using the coastwide040118.bse baseline that is comprised of 214 distinct populations.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"Hakai Institute\", \"title\": \"Genetic Stock Identification of Juvenile Sockeye Salmon Captured in the Discovery Islands and Johnstone Strait BC, Canada\", \"version\": \"2.0\", \"DOI\": \"10.21966/9ktc-qm09\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_6f6560e7-7497-4685-9df2-51c66080b7c9?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>This datasets contains genetic stock identifications for juvenile sockeye salmon collected by the Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program between 2015 and 2021. This information tells us the probability that each specific fish originates from a specific watershed. The stock ID was done at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Pacific Biological Station in Nanaimo BC using the coastwide040118.bse baseline that is comprised of 214 distinct populations.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup xlink:href="https://cioos.ca/translation_method" xlink:role="translation" xlink:title="text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service de traduction Amazon">
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">Ces ensembles de données contiennent des identifications génétiques de stocks de saumons rouges juvéniles collectées par le Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program entre 2015 et 2021. Ces informations nous indiquent la probabilité que chaque poisson soit originaire d'un bassin versant spécifique. L'identification du stock a été effectuée à la station biologique du Pacifique du ministère des Pêches et des Océans à Nanaimo, en Colombie-Britannique, en utilisant la base de référence coastwide040118.bse, qui comprend 214 populations distinctes.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>

        <gco:CharacterString></gco:CharacterString>
      </mri:credit>

name: ca-cioos_6f6560e7-7497-4685-9df2-51c66080b7c9
notes: This datasets contains genetic stock identifications for juvenile sockeye salmon collected by the Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program between 2015 and 2021. This information tells us the probability that each specific fish originates from a specific watershed. The stock ID was done at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Pacific Biological Station in Nanaimo BC using the coastwide040118.bse baseline that is comprised of 214 distinct populations.

notes_translated.en: This datasets contains genetic stock identifications for juvenile sockeye salmon collected by the Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program between 2015 and 2021. This information tells us the probability that each specific fish originates from a specific watershed. The stock ID was done at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Pacific Biological Station in Nanaimo BC using the coastwide040118.bse baseline that is comprised of 214 distinct populations.
notes_translated.fr: Ces ensembles de données contiennent des identifications génétiques de stocks de saumons rouges juvéniles collectées par le Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program entre 2015 et 2021. Ces informations nous indiquent la probabilité que chaque poisson soit originaire d'un bassin versant spécifique. L'identification du stock a été effectuée à la station biologique du Pacifique du ministère des Pêches et des Océans à Nanaimo, en Colombie-Britannique, en utilisant la base de référence coastwide040118.bse, qui comprend 214 populations distinctes.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.
